locale.sms_code_sent: SMS with one-time code was sent to
locale.can_use_code: You can use the code for: {{amount}} seconds
locale.unconfirmed_transactions: You have unconfirmed transactions. Please enter the sender's name
locale.accordance_with_terms_conditions: In accordance with Terms and Conditions, your bonus program will be terminated after 30 days upon request.
locale.directed_to_gekkoin: You will be directed to your personal Gekkoin account, where you can open fixed-income deposits or deposits linked to changes in the exchange rate of your chosen cryptocurrency

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: If you have any questions or difficulties, please let us know in any of the following way:

partnership_program.title: Partnership program
partnership_program.subtitle: Earn rewards by inviting friends to Gekkard platform
partnership_program.agent_who_attracts: The agent who attracts the referral will receive:
partnership_program.monthly_balance_first_year: on the average monthly balance in the GKE of each attracted referral during the first year
partnership_program.monthly_balance_second_year: on the average monthly balance in the GKE of eachattracted referral during the second year
partnership_program.rewards_transferred: Rewards are transferred to your GKE balance at the end of the billing month.
partnership_program.bring_your_friends: Bring your friends or followers to open a structured deposit via Gekkoin - and get rewarded with 2% from each deposit’s amount opened by your referrals within a year since their registration.
partnership_program.reward_right_after: You get the reward right after the closure of your referral’s deposit (if it was not closed prematurely).

crypto_assets.title: Crypto assets
crypto_assets.subtitle: Choose and buy the assets interested you
crypto_assets.swap_EURG: You may swap your EURG for Bitcoin or most popular altcoins
crypto_assets.bitcoin_first_popular: Bitcoin is the first and most popular cryptocurrency in the world.
crypto_assets.alternative_cryptocurrencies: In the wake of the success of BTC, other alternative cryptocurrencies began to appear, which are called "altcoins". Keeping the essence of the Bitcoin idea, most altcoins are trying to find competitive advantages in their versions.
crypto_assets.different_altcoins: At the moment, there are more than 17 thousand different altcoins. Here you can purchase the most interesting and popular ones.
crypto_assets.risks: By purchasing tokens, you take on all the risks associated with the volatility of cryptocurrencies. If you are interested in safer investment instruments, we recommend that you use
crypto_assets.directed_to_gekkoin: You will be directed to your personal Gekkoin account, where you can open fixed-income deposits or deposits linked to changes in the exchange rate of your chosen cryptocurrency.
crypto_assets.name: Name

locale.your_account_has_been_topped: Your account has been topped up for the amount:
locale.problem_with_form: There was a problem with loading the form. Please try again later.
locale.create_special_code: Create a special code with which you can transfer funds between Gekkoin users with or without your confirmation.
locale.when_using_confirmation: When using confirmation, your funds will be debited from the account as soon as the user applies the code, however, funds will be credited to the recipient only if you confirm transfer. If confirmation does not occur, it will be possible to return the funds only through contacting the Support of both the sender and the recipient of the funds.
locale.no_have_transfer_code: You don't have any transfer codes for this time.
locale.you_made_transfer: You made a transfer in the amount of:
locale.code_will_be_deleted: This code will be deleted from the system. It will not be possible to transfer funds using this code.
locale.block_selected_bank_card: Are you sure you want to block selected bank card?
locale.unblock_selected_bank_card: Are you sure you want to unblock selected bank card?
locale.for_security_reasons: For security reasons your physical card was sent deactivated and could not be used without activation.
locale.virtual_card_data_for_online: You can still use your virtual card data for online shopping in internet. Each transaction is protected by 3D secure with one time code sent you in SMS.
locale.using_your_physical_card: To start using your physical card you should activate it upon delivery. To do that, just press button below. We will send you a one time activation code.
locale.activate_your_card: Please, activate your card only if the number embossed on your physical card is identical to your virtual card!
locale.eurg_tooltip_text:
We pay you 3% per annum of EURG on your balance under following conditions:

 (i) your weighted average balance for the reporting period is equal to or higher than 300 EURG

 (ii) our upper limit for the balance to pay the interest rate is 100,000 EURG.
locale.gke_tooltip_text:
Fixed yield on average monthly balance (in GKE tokens): 
➔ 5% p.a. first year from the date of issue 
➔ 3% p.a. second year from the date of issue
locale.EUR_is_utility_token: Gekkoin Europe (EURG) is a utility token that provides access to the Gekkoin ecosystem. All EURG tokens are subject to exchange for fiat money in accordance with the conditions on this site and the
locale.for_more_information: For more information of the EURG token please read our
locale.you_get_per_annum: You get 3% per annum of EURG on your balance once a month under the following conditions
locale.your_weighted_average: your weighted average balance for the reporting period is equal to or higher than 300 EURG
locale.our_upper_limit: our upper limit for the balance to pay the interest rate is 100,000 EURG
locale.EURG_tokens_created: Gekkoin Europe (EURG) tokens are created and redeemed in accordance with the emission rules
locale.EURG_built_on: EURG is built on the Ethereum platform in according to the ERC20 standard for tokens. The code of the EURG smart contract has been audited by Hacken OÜ, a cybersecurity firm. The report is publicly available
locale.GKE_tokens: GKE tokens in the Gekkard ecosystem are the flagship of a new type of crypto assets reflecting the efficient and cost-effective integration of cryptocurrency and fintech solutions in the banking sector
locale.token_holders: Token holders will have privileges and bonuses directly related to the income of the ecosystem, in addition to the potential increase in the value of the token itself
locale.fixed_return: Fixed return on the average monthly balance (in GKE tokens)
locale.first_year: per annum (the first year from the date of issue)
locale.second_year: per annum (the second year from the date of issue)
locale.referral_program: Referral program. The agent who attracts the referral will receive
locale.first_year_referral: per annum (on the average monthly balance in the GKE of each attracted referral during the first year)
locale.second_year_referral: per annum (on the average monthly balance in the GKE of each attracted referral during the second year)
locale.GKE_tokens_blocked: (If GKE tokens are blocked in proportion of 1:1 with EURG, the deposits placed in EURG will be charged double yield, and if there is a loss, it will be expressed as a twofold reduction of the loss)
locale.gekkard_card_expenses: on Gekkard card expenses on monthly turnover in Euros (within the limits not exceeding the volume of the similar number of blocked GKE tokens)
locale.without_restrictions: (without restrictions on the maximum amount of exchange, but with the need to block the volume of GKE corresponding to the turnover in fiat)
locale.locking_tokens_gives: Locking {{currency}} tokens gives you access to the no fee crypto-fiat transactions
locale.up_amount_not_exceeding_similar: Up to the amount not exceeding a similar number of blocked {{currency}} tokens. Funds are blocked for 90 days.
locale.end_of_the_program_term: At the end of the program term, the blocked {{currency}} funds will return to your account
locale.period_of_locking_tokens: The period of locking tokens is 90 days. Start and end dates of the program will be updated
locale.top_up_send_buy_sell: Top up, Send, Buy and Sell your
locale.eurg_description: EURG is utility token of Gekkard platform. You can change this token at the rate of 1 EURG = 1 EUR. You can receive 3% on the balance of your funds

exchange.title: Crypto exchange
exchange.owner_private_room: You are owner of this private room. A Gekkard user will be able to join your room using this
exchange.any_gekkard_user: Any Gekkard user will be able to join your privite exchange room by folowing this link.
exchange.invite_link_is_available: This invite link is available for 24 hours.
exchange.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to
exchange.close_private_exchange: close the current private exchange room? All
exchange.leave_private_exchange: leave the current private exchange room? Your
exchange.order_execution_depends: order execution depends on the market situation
exchange.no_opened_orders: You don't have any opened orders
exchange.private_room_allows: A private room allows you to exchange assets only with those members whom you invite through a speciallink. Trades in the private room will not be shared.
exchange.only_i_can: Only I can specify the sale price
exchange.it_is_empty: If it is empty, then the limit is not set
exchange.cancel_this_order: Are you sure you want to cancel this order? This action cannot be canceled.
exchange.error_occurred_while_executing_order: An error occurred while executing the order. Please, contact with technical support.
